content: gothic arches is a unisex sock pattern that is knit top-down it uses bavarian twisted stitches to portray the typical arches you can find in gothic buildings and features a fleegle heel there are 3 sizes available small 60 stitches medium 70 stitches and large 80 stitches you ll need approximately 80 to 110 grams of fingering weight sock yarn > this pattern is included in my **buy 3 > get 1 free ** sale just add any 4 of > my patterns to your cart and get the > cheapest one for free other materials required are a set of knitting needles for working small circumferences in the round at least 2 stitch markers 2 cable needles and a darning needle for kitchener stitch if you go for a beaded version of this pattern you ll also need 36 42 48 size 8/0 or 6/0 beads and your beading tool of choice e g crochet hook superfloss etc this pattern contains 9 pages basic instructions are 3 pages then there are 2 pages of charts per size and 3 pages for full written instructions of the charts a big thank you goes out to my test knitters bikewi /people/bikewi bumbleknits /people/bumbleknits drahdiwawal /people/drahdiwawal jraltonsmith /people/jraltonsmith kaisukka /people/kaisukka linabear /people/linabear and tescamaru /people/tescamaru *********** mededeling voor nederlandstaligen op dit moment is dit patroon niet beschikbaar in het nederlands als je wil kan ik je echter wel in het nederlands verder helpen als er iets onduidelijk of moeilijk te begrijpen is
